local_intent: Ensure the T-block is localized, align to a pushable edge, set yaw, and execute one 0.1m push at 225 degrees.
coherence_with_global: Uses the same perceive->align->push structure and the exact push parameters (target=t_block, distance=0.1, direction_deg=225, timeout_ms=1200) as the GLOBAL_BT transfer phase.
